title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 2C.111 - RUMBLE STRIPS Sign (NYW4-17)
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 2C.111 - RUMBLE STRIPS Sign (NYW4-17)

State Regulations

Option: 01 The RUMBLE STRIPS (NYW4-17) sign (see Sign Drawing
SD-W14) may be used, as necessary, to warn of roadway sections where rumble
strips have been installed. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
2C.111

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
